processDocumentation.timeDescription: Adapted from 1990's conditions and considered valid until 2015. Uncertainty has been modified accordingly
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Quebec dataset based on Global dataset, which was itself based on german conditions. Uncertainty has been modified accordingly
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average used in early 1990s. Stoker boiler used as reference technology. Uncertainty has been modified accordingly
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see Geography This dataset has been extrapolated from the corresponding global dataset, which was itself extrapolated from a dataset covering the geography RER. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.

exchanges.description:
EcoSpold01Location=RER
Estimation. It is assumed that 2% of the feed water is additionally required as decarbonised water (6t per TJin). For wet purification 1.5t per TJin of water is needed. Due to the lack of information the water used for cleaning can not be considered.
